entities.name: Ai Influencers
entities.summary: Generating AI influencer photos using Midjourney v6.1.
entities.fullSummary:
Generating AI influencer photos using Midjourney v6.1.
- **Platform:** Midjourney (via Discord bot)
- **Plan:** Basic ($8/month annual), ~3h 20m fast hours/month
- **Method:** Automated cron job (2:00 AM nightly)
- **Output:** 5 images per night (respecting plan limits)
- **Focus:** Fashion-forward, elegant looks (no bikini/swimwear - filtered)
- **Higgsfield phase (Jan 29-30):** 7 images, paused for ethical review
- **Midjourney phase (Jan 30+):** Active, significantly better quality
- ‚úÖ Fashion/designer/elegant outfits
- ‚úÖ Body descriptions (subtle)

facts.fact: Jan 31 nightly generation: 5 images (Dubai, Monaco, Paris, Maldives, Amalfi Coast) - all fashion-forward elegant looks
7 images generated successfully via Higgsfield (Dubai, Monaco, Milan, Tokyo, Swiss, Bali, Amalfi)
Project paused due to ethical concerns with exclusionary demographic constraints
Switched to Midjourney v6.1 - significantly better quality than Higgsfield. Basic plan ($8/mo), 5 images per night via cron
Midjourney content filter blocks bikini/swimwear + body descriptions. Pivoted to fashion/elegant outfits only
First Midjourney batch generated: Dubai rooftop, Monaco yacht, Milan Fashion Week (3 successful, 1 filtered)
Project uses Higgsfield Nano Banana Pro via browser automation
Prompt bank contains 20+ prompts stored in prompt-bank.md

entities.name: Alessa
entities.fullSummary:
**Industry:** Women's fashion e-commerce
**Markets:** Bulgaria (primary), Greece (expansion)
**Founders:** Ivo (operations, marketing) + Mimi (model, co-founder)
- Bulgarian fashion brand: dresses, jackets, coats, blouses
- Custom-built e-commerce platform (not Shopify/WooCommerce)
- ~‚Ç¨1M monthly revenue, 23% net margin
| Metric | Bulgaria | Greece |
|--------|----------|--------|
| Sessions/day | ~10-12K | ~400 |
| CVR | 1.2-1.6% | Broken tracking |

facts.fact: Week ending Jan 31: BG revenue -30.3% WoW, sessions -21%, CVR -9.6%, bounce +7.3%. Post-holiday normalization.
BigQuery setup in progress - needs GCP billing enabled on alessa-analytics project
Two GCP projects exist: 'Alessa' (golden-pointer-319910) and 'Alessa Analytics' (alessa-analytics) - use alessa-analytics
BigQuery streaming export needed for real-time 'Today' data in Command Center
500-1000 products need English copy; Copy Generator tool built at finess007.github.io/alessa-copy
English copy style calibrated: 10R emotional framework, dashes not em-dashes, 1-2 emojis, American spelling
Week ending Jan 30: BG revenue crashed -47.5% WoW (349K ‚Üí 183K BGN), CVR dropped -27% (1.63% ‚Üí 1.19%), bounce +14%
January 2026 slump diagnosis: traffic quality problem (ad fatigue suspected), not pricing - AOV holding steady
English copy production started: 16/952 products completed, using CSV workflow (local file ‚Üí import to platform)
English copy production completed: 300 product descriptions done, merged CSV ready for dev team import
Copy Generator tool live at finess007.github.io/alessa-copy - interactive prompt builder with angle tracking
Alessa is a Bulgarian women's fashion e-commerce brand owned by Ivo
Ivo has full control over product, marketing, and operations
Primary market is Bulgaria, with expansion into Greece
Platform is custom-built (not Shopify/WooCommerce)
Greece e-commerce tracking is broken - needs fixing
2025 was a growth year: 1.6M active users, +14% YoY
January 2025 had exceptionally strong sales due to better sale inventory
Product quality/selection drives sales more than marketing spend
GA4 access granted via service account nova-analytics@alessa-analytics.iam.gserviceaccount.com
Copy library built: power-words.md, adjectives, 10R-benefits, dress-types, materials, CTAs at /life/areas/companies/alessa/copy-library/
Mimi is the model/face of Alessa and co-founder - appears in product photography

entities.name: Bitcoin
entities.fullSummary:
- **BTC maximalist:** Everything returns to Bitcoin
- Target: 10x+ returns, aggressive high-conviction plays
- Timeline: Longer than 2-3 years for full ecosystem migration
- **Entry:** $113,244
- **Leverage:** 2x
- **Exposure:** ~1.27 BTC long
- **Collateral:** 1.825 BTC in Binance futures wallet
- **Liquidation:** ~$42K
- **Reserve:** $51K USDC in spot wallet
- USDC-M contract but BTC collateral = asymmetric risk

facts.fact: Active BTC long position on Binance Futures: Entry $113,244, 2x leverage, ~1.27 BTC exposure
Position collateral: 1.825 BTC in futures wallet (~$140K at $77K). USDC-M contract but BTC collateral (asymmetric risk)
Liquidation price ~$42K. Key insight: liq shoots up fast because BTC collateral shrinks as price drops (double whammy)
Reserve: $51K USDC in spot wallet for emergency margin injection at $60-65K range
Exit target: $450K (4x entry). Strategy: close position, convert all to spot BTC. Expected: 1.825‚Üí3.19 BTC (+75%)
Leverage math learned: At 2x, max BTC accumulation approaches 2x original (never exceeds). Formula: EndingBTC = Exposure - (InitialMargin/ExitPrice)
Interested in Bitcoin, ordinals, and crypto for 10x+ returns

entities.name: English Mastery
entities.summary: **Goal:** Take Ivo from strong-but-non-native to native-sounding fluency.
entities.fullSummary:
**Goal:** Take Ivo from strong-but-non-native to native-sounding fluency.
**Method:** Daily coaching embedded in regular conversation.
- **Session 1:** 48% (11/23) ‚Äî Jan 31
- **Session 2:** 56% (30/54) ‚Äî Jan 31
- **Session 3:** 88% (21/24) ‚Äî Jan 31 üéâ
Massive improvement after reordering phrasal verbs by corpus frequency (Top 100 focus).
1. **Live Corrections** ‚Äî Every message, inline, no lectures ‚úÖ ACTIVE
2. **Patterns, Not Grammar** ‚Äî Chunks natives actually use ‚úÖ ACTIVE
3. **Writing Voice Coaching** ‚Äî Rewrite public content to sound native
4. **Voice Practice** ‚Äî Future (needs low-latency voice tech)

facts.fact: Session 1 (Jan 31): 48% (11/23). First phrasal verbs practice session.
Session 2 (Jan 31): 56% (30/54). 8 rounds of practice.
Session 3 (Jan 31): 88% (21/24). Breakthrough after reordering by corpus frequency.
Key insight: Focus on Top 100 phrasal verbs by frequency until 80%+ accuracy
Ivo has 2x/week English lessons with Megan (Canadian teacher). Conversational format.

entities.name: Moltbook
entities.fullSummary:
**Type:** AI Social Network
**URL:** https://moltbook.com
**Tagline:** "The front page of the agent internet"
Social network/Reddit-like platform designed for AI agents. Bots can post, comment, and interact. Like Reddit but the participants are AIs.
- 4,317 communities
- 7,316 posts
Found a thread about memory management after context compression with 944 comments from AI agents sharing strategies. Valuable resource for memory system ideas.
